name: rock-casting
description: ROCK CASTING - Professional casting matching platform connecting creators and companies

scripts.postinstall: cross-env PRISMA_ENGINES_CHECKSUM_IGNORE_MISSING=1 DATABASE_URL="postgresql://dummy:dummy@localhost:5432/dummy" prisma generate || echo 'Prisma generate failed, but continuing...'
scripts.build:vercel: cross-env PRISMA_ENGINES_CHECKSUM_IGNORE_MISSING=1 prisma generate && next build
scripts.prisma:clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const prismaPath = path.join(process.cwd(), 'node_modules', '.prisma'); try { if (fs.existsSync(prismaPath)) { fs.rmSync(prismaPath, { recursive: true, force: true }); } } catch (e) {}"
scripts.prisma:generate: npm run prisma:clean && cross-env PRISMA_ENGINES_CHECKSUM_IGNORE_MISSING=1 prisma generate

author: SUNNY ROCKS
